question: If you asked your friends to describe you in one word, what would they say?
ans: Relaxed. I’m typically the easy-going one.
Loud. I love being the life of the party!
Flirtatious. I can’t go a day without winking at someone.
Indifferent. I generally don’t care what’s going on.

question: The popular kids invite you to the biggest party of the year. How do you respond?
ans: By fist bumping them. Sounds pretty cool, if you ask me.
By jumping up and down. This is going to be epic!
With a giggle. I’m already planning the best, eye-catching outfit.
With a shrug. I’m only going if my friends drag me along.

question: Someone walks into the room to see you chilling on the couch. How do they find you?
ans: Draped over the couch with my arms casually behind my head.
Balancing on the arm of the couch. I like the challenge.
Sitting upright with my legs crossed and back straight. I have to look my best.
Whatever feels comfortable for me in the moment.

question: It’s finally the weekend, and you’ve got the whole house to yourself. What’s the first thing you do?
ans: Who knows, man? I’ll flow with whatever comes my way.
Call all my friends to have the most epic party ever!
Text my crush to see if he wants to come over and hang out.
Silence my phone, close the blinds, and settle in for a movie marathon.

question: You’re totally crushing on your lab partner. What’s your next move?
ans: Nothing. I’ll just talk to them and see what happens.
Ask a million questions, and bite my tongue long enough for them to answer.
Scooch my chair closer and flirt. They’ll be asking me out by the end of the day.
Try to avoid eye contact. If they look into my eyes, I’m a goner.

question: The waiter comes by to take your order, but you’re still scanning the menu. What do you do?
ans: Give them the menu and ask them to surprise me.
Ask what they’d recommend and start a conversation.
Bat my eyelashes and ask for a few more minutes.
Avoid their eyes and quietly ask for more time.

question: How would you describe your bedroom in 3 words?
ans: Cozy, bright, and lived-in.
Vibrant, messy, and mismatched.
Romantic, comfortable, and tidy.
Dark, safe, and quiet.

question: You slip and fall in front of the whole school! With everyone’s eyes on you, what do you do?
ans: Get up and smile like nothing happened. People fall all the time, after all.
Jump up and laugh along with them. Maybe I’ll even take a bow!
Try to keep my face from turning red. Please tell me my crush didn’t see…
Crawl away absolutely mortified. School’s the worst.

question: What do you want people to remember the most about you?
ans: That I was always a good friend.
My wild stories! I want my adventures and antics to be the talk of every party.
Anything, as long as it doesn’t involve my exes.
I don’t think they’ll remember me. If they do, I hope it’s for my deep thoughts.

question: You’re heading to the movies. What do you beg your friends to watch with you?
ans: Anything’s cool with me! But I’ll always advocate for ones with talking dogs.
Something action-packed or that will make you wet your pants with fear!
They better want to see the rom-com. It has something for everyone.
I’d rather go by myself or watch at home so I don’t have to argue.

question: If you could be any celebrity for a day, who would you be?
ans: Jennifer Lawrence. She’s so down-to-earth.
Lindsay Lohan. She knows how to party.
Chris Evans. He knows he’s hot and isn’t afraid to show it.
Robert Pattison. Mysterious and equally fine.

question: What quote speaks to you the most?
ans: “Don’t take things too seriously.”
“Life is nothing without a little chaos to make it interesting.”
“Spread love everywhere you go.”
“Quiet people have the loudest minds.”
